nodes.text: The Japrael sector, also known as the Onderon sector, was a sector of the Inner Rim region of the galaxy. It contained the Japrael system, which was the location of the planet Onderon. In the final years of the Galactic Republic, it was represented in the Galactic Senate, and during the Clone Wars in the Separatist Senate, by Onderonian Senator Mina Bonteri.

The Japrael sector was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends novel Darth Bane: Rule of Two, which was written by Drew Karpyshyn and published in 2007. The sector was confirmed to be canon in the reference book Ultimate Star Wars.
